about.hero.title: About REX CAR
about.hero.subtitle: Elite. Precision. Shine.
about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.content: REX CAR was founded with a simple mission: to provide the highest quality car care services with unmatched attention to detail. We believe every vehicle deserves royal treatment.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.content: To deliver exceptional car care services that exceed expectations while building lasting relationships with our customers through trust, quality, and reliability.
about.values.title: Our Values
about.values.description: The principles that guide everything we do at REX CAR
about.values.quality.desc: We never compromise on the quality of our services and products.
about.values.customer.desc: Your satisfaction is our top priority in everything we do.
about.values.innovation.desc: We continuously adopt the latest techniques and technologies.
about.team.title: Our Team
about.team.content: Our success is built on the expertise and dedication of our professional team. Each member brings years of experience and a passion for automotive excellence.
about.team.content2: From our skilled technicians to our customer service representatives, everyone at REX CAR is committed to delivering the royal treatment your vehicle deserves.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help with all your car care needs. Reach out to us with any questions or to schedule a service.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Our team is ready to assist you with premium car care services. Reach out through any of these channels.

map.placeholder: Interactive Map will be displayed here

response.title: Quick Response Time
response.message: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our services.

q1.question: How long does a typical wash service take?
q1.answer: Our standard wash takes about 30 minutes, while premium services like nano ceramic coating can take 2-3 hours.

q2.question: Do I need to book an appointment?
q2.answer: Walk-ins are welcome, but we recommend booking an appointment to guarantee your preferred time slot.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, and mobile payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

services.hero.title: Our Premium Services
services.hero.subtitle: Professional car care tailored to your needs
services.wash.title: Premium Wash
services.wash.description: Complete exterior and interior cleaning service using premium products and professional techniques. Includes hand wash, interior vacuuming, dashboard cleaning, and tire shine.
services.wash.features: Hand wash, Interior cleaning, Dashboard care, Tire shine
services.dryclean.title: Professional Dry Clean
services.dryclean.description: Specialized dry cleaning service for upholstery, carpets, and interior fabrics. Removes stains, odors, and restores the original look of your car's interior.
services.dryclean.features: Upholstery cleaning, Stain removal, Odor elimination, Fabric protection
services.polish.title: Paint Polish & Correction
services.polish.description: Professional paint correction and polishing service that removes scratches, swirl marks, and oxidation to restore your car's original shine and luster.
services.polish.features: Scratch removal, Swirl mark correction, Paint restoration, Mirror finish
services.nano.title: Nano Ceramic Coating
services.nano.description: Advanced nano ceramic coating technology that creates a protective layer on your vehicle's paint. Provides excellent hydrophobic properties, UV protection, and chemical resistance.
services.nano.features: Hydrophobic coating, UV protection, Chemical resistance, Enhanced gloss
services.graphene.title: Graphene Coating
services.graphene.description: Revolutionary graphene coating technology offering superior protection and performance. Provides exceptional durability, heat dissipation, and anti-static properties.
services.graphene.features: Superior durability, Heat dissipation, Anti-static properties, Self-healing technology
